name: Geode Station
description:
Fullscreen recommended! Fend off subway-dwelling monsters with your trusty, crystal-powered weapon. An endless shoot-'em-up where you break crystals to get new weapon types and use them to fight back the rock-monster hordes.

Updates pending very soon! Had a lot of fun making this (especially since I got to bring in some of my nerdiness for rocks and minerals) and I can't wait to polish it even more.

(Update: Fixed some minor issues with both the game and the download process / zip file. Update 2: Fixed the thing where there were two zip files to download. Update 3: You can play it in ya browser now!)
